rows.author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story looks at counting to 5, descriptions, and comparisons. Practice describing words: too, very, short, tall, long, low, high, big, small; color names; and comparison words: shorter, taller, longer, lower, higher, bigger, smaller

rows.author: Ursula Nafula
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has  counting to 12, colors, and shapes. Practice words: one, two, to twelve, estimate, take away, color names, shortest, tallest, similar, and different.

rows.author: Bubaali Primary School
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story looks at counting from 0 to 9, colors, and color patterns. Practice counting words, color words, words like: too many, biggest number, smallest number, one more, and one less.

rows.name::eng: Cat and Dog and the Ball
rows.author: Elke and René Leisink
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 6, colors, and descriptions. Practice counting words, color names, and words: high, too, similar, different, smallest, biggest, short, tall, biggest, smallest, fewer, and more.

rows.name::eng: Cat and Dog and the Butterfly
rows.author: Elke and René Leisink
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has speed descriptions, colors, and counting to 6. Practice counting words, color words, and these words: very, too, fast, slow, faster, slower, fastest, slowest, most, and least.

rows.name::eng: Cat and Dog and the Egg
rows.author: Elke and René Leisink
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 5, comparing, colors, and shapes. Practice words: round, above, below, similar, round, kite, different, bigger, and longer.

rows.name::eng: Cat and Dog: Dog Is Cold
rows.author: Elke and René Leisink
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story talks about extremes of describing words, and counting to 6 with one more or one less. Words to practice are: too, cold, warm, hot, light, dark, day, night, clean, dirty, small, big, short, long, wet, dry, thin, thick, low, high, new, and old.

rows.author: Ursula Nafula
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has geometry ideas and colors. Practice words: square, rectangle, circle, concentric, open, closed, least, little, small, big, and color names.

rows.author: Caren Echesa
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story talks about the numbers to seven, the ordinals to seventh, and colors. Practice the words: one, two, three, to seven; the ordinals first, second, third, to seventh; and the many names of colors.

rows.author: Clare Verbeek
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 9 and number and size comparisons. Practice words: one, two, to nine, big, small, most, least, one more, and one less.

rows.author: Mlungisi Madlala
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to seven and shapes. Practice words: small numbers, especially one and two; and comparing words such as more, equal, same, and less. Also, talk about squares, circles, solids, stripes, bigger, and smaller.

rows.author: Owino Ogot
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has patterns, sizes, and shapes. Practice words: size, big, little, medium, small, same, shape, and pattern.

rows.author: African Storybook
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has quantities to ten, comparing, and colors. Practice words: counting to ten, most, more, less, bigger, smaller, shortest, tallest, color names, solid, striped, and checkerboard.

rows.author: Clare Verbeek
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has quantities up to ten. Practice words: how many, one more, most, and least.

rows.author: Nathaniel Bivan
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has quantities to 10, comparing quantities, and shapes. Practice words: how many, most, least, one more, how many more, difference, rectangle, square, circle, and round.

rows.author: Hlengiwe Zondi
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 6, colors, and shapes. Practice words: how many, numbers to six, one more, two more, one less, two less, color names, stripes, solids, pentagon, hexagon, round, same, and different.

rows.name::eng: How the Toad Got its Skin
rows.author: Jane Taylor
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 16, shapes, and colors. Practice words: counting by 2's or 4's, more, less, one more, color names, circle, center, and concentric.

rows.author: Jenny Katz
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has  small quantities up to 8. Practice words: numbers to 8, how many, one more, small, and large.

rows.author: African Storybook
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 5, shapes, and colors. Practice words: numbers to 5, color names, too, too big, too small, just right, matching colors, and rectangle.

rows.author: Simon Ipoo
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 12, comparing, and shapes. Practice words: numbers to 12, how many, estimate, counting by 2's, more, less, difference, round shape, box shape, loop, and pattern.

rows.author: Ruth Odondi
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has quantities up to six and comparing. Practice words: numbers to six, more, most, less, least, and rectangle.

rows.name::eng: The Day the Sun Went Away
rows.author: Khothatso Ranoosi
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 7, comparing, and shapes. Practice words: numbers to 7, how many, same, less, more, one more, one less, too, too many, round, sphere, ball, cylinder, warm, warmer, cool, and cooler.

rows.author: African Storybook
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 10 and shapes. Practice words: numbers up to 10, one more, two more, three more, counting by 2's, equal, rectangle, circle, concentric, straight, and curved.

rows.author: Mohale Mashigo
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 10, comparing sizes, and geometry. Practice words: numbers to 10, one more, one less, less, more, small, big, too, too big, smallest, largest, triangle, rectangle, pentagon, cylinder, same, on, under, and on top of.

rows.author: Madhav Chavan
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 7, relationship words, and shapes. Practice words: how many, numbers to 7, one more, one less, behind, inside, on, high, too high, under, rectangle, box, and vertical line.

rows.author: Clare  Verbeek
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 5, relationship words, and colors. Practice words: numbers to 5, under, on top of, over, behind, next to, inside, outside, color names, straight, and curved.

rows.author: Samantha Cutler
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 12, comparing, and shapes. Practice words: numbers to 12, smallest, shortest, longest, more, less, circle, arc, triangle, rectangle, right angle, straight lines, diagonal, shapes made with lines, Y shape.

rows.author: Liesl Jobson
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 8, descriptions and comparisons, and shapes. Practice words: numbers to 8, earlier, later, dark, faster, down, backwards, longest, more, little, different, triangle, rectangle, line, side, straight, horizon, and horizontal.

rows.author: AIsha Nelson
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has colors, descriptions, and shapes. Practice words: white, red, yellow, orange, brown, rainbow colors, same, matching, different, difference, long, longer, short, very, curved, straight, round, triangle, and rectangle.

rows.author: Nozizwe Herero
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has geometry and shape ideas. Practice words: circle, rectangle, sides, corner, vertical line, horizontal line, big, small, low, and high

rows.author: Divine Apedo
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 20, descriptions, and shapes.  Practice words: very, extremely, more, difference, rectangle, square, round, cone, triangle, alike, different, dividing by 1, 2, and 1/2, vertical, horizontal, perpendicular, oldest, youngest, inside, and outside.

rows.name::eng: Cat and Dog Draw and Color
rows.author: Elke and René Leisink
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes, comparisons, and skip counting.  Practice words: rectangle, square, oval, circle, arc, triangle, line, straight, curved, mirror symmetry, similar, different, less, same, more, pair, difference, right, left, skip counting by 2's, 3's, and 5's.

rows.author: Judith Baker
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has skip counting and number properties. Practice words: skip counting, counting by a number, even, odd, more, less, above, and below.

rows.author: Mohammed Kuyu
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes and skip counting.  Practice words: round, cone, rectangle, long, vertical line, horizontal line, right angle, steep, zero, adding one, skip counting by 2's, 3's, 4's, and 6's.

rows.author: Osu Library Fund
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 10 and comparing sizes. Practice words: numbers to 10, big, bigger, small, smaller, wide, wider, narrow, narrower, more, less, same, one more, and twice.

rows.author: Clare Verbeek
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 14 and skip counting. Practice words: numbers to 14, skip counting, more, fewer, one more, three more, and double.

rows.author: Gertrude Kobusinge
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to ten and comparing quantities. Practice words: numbers to ten, counting by 2's, one more, one less, most, and least.

rows.author: Fred Strydom
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting to 8 and comparing. Practice words: one more, one less, take away, fact family, symmetry, mirror symmetry, similarity, difference, and same.

rows.author: Noni
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has  counting to 10 and comparing. Practice words: more, less, difference, and counting by 2's.

rows.author: Leo Daly
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has many shapes. Practice words: circle, round, short, polygon, side, triangle, quadrilateral, pentagon, hexagon, square, rectangle, diamond, rhombus, cone, pattern, concentric circles, colors, tall, tallest, far, farthest, long, half, pair, add, subtract, easy, hard, easier, harder, and problem solving.

rows.author: Brendon O'Neill
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes and descriptions. Practice words: thin, pairs, line, parallel, horizontal, vertical, perpendicular, negative space, different, triangle, side, straight, sphere, circle, arc, red, blue, right, left, and skip count by 5's.

rows.author: Mutugi Kamundi
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes and groupings. Practice words: long, round, cone, flat, rectangle, square, close, closer, estimate, skip counting by 2's and 4's, colors, more, less, object properties, grouping by property, fewer, first, last, after, before, faster, slower, none, and zero.

rows.author: Athieno Gertrude
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has many shapes. Practice words: rainbow, circle, arc, polygon, rectangle, pentagon, big, large, straight, curved, box, top, many, color names, rainbow, next, and too much.

rows.author: Maya Fowler
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has descriptions and comparisons. Practice words: high, on, onto, average, speed, 5 times, pairs, odd, even, sharing, too, very, fast, long, distance, light, heavy, lower, higher, different, estimate, more, stronger, vertically, diagonally, parallel lines, and big.

rows.author: Ursula Nafula
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes, colors, and skip counting. Practice words: patterns, row, lighter, darker, rectangle, triangle, round, side, circle, concentric circles, shallow, faint, closer, farther, differences, color names, colors of the rainbow, pair, doubling, and skip counting by 2's, 3's, and 4's.

rows.author: Nwanne Felix-Emeribe
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes and geometry.  Practice words: side, triangle, rectangle, pentagon, circle, oval, arc, big, flat, faint, faded, distance, far away, problem solving, horizontal lines, parallel lines, perspective, width, and dividing 8 evenly.

rows.author: Tagel Aboneh
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes and geometry.  Practice words: distance, middle, rectangle, triangle, pale, twice, pairs, counting by 20's, 50's, and 100's.

rows.author: Mezemir Girma
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has comparing words and counting in groups. Practice words: heavy, faster, enough, more than, too tight, very, old, skip counting by 2's and 4's, equal sharing, pair, pairing, odd, even, estimate, hundred, thousand, million, side, opposite side, round, and rectangle.

rows.author: African Storybook
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes and quantities. Practice words: round, cone, different shape, hexagon, regular hexagon, tile designs, squares, patterns, more, less, fewer, same, equal, number difference, estimate, stronger, weaker, faster, slower, slowly, and speed.

rows.author: Nina Orange
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes and descriptions. Practice words: triangle, rectangle, pentagon, hexagon, sides, diagonal, circle, oval, cylinder, ball, sphere, stripe, thin, small, big, flat, pairs, opposite, center, long, high, twice, measurement, and estimate.

rows.author: Mimi Werna
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes and descriptions. Practice words: circle, arc, oval, lines, sides, straight, rectangle, curve, color names, rainbow colors, double, high, pairs, and skip counting by 2's.

rows.author: Ursula Nafula
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes, descriptions, and perspective. Practice words: rectangle, sides, square, straight, curved, parallel lines, color names, rainbow colors, little, twice, tall, taller, short, shorter, far, farthest, farther, apart, large, thick, close, too close, small, too small, below, and estimate.

rows.name::eng: Searching for the Spirit of Spring
rows.author: Mosa Mahlaba
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes and descriptions. Practice words: circle, oval, arc, cone, rectangle, triangle, long, longest, far, far away, distance, big, bigger, pattern, color, bright, dull, muted, drab, giant, dark, too dark, and problem solving.

rows.author: Penelope Smith
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes and dividing evenly. Practice words: rectangle, square, round, circle, arc, oval, ellipse, stripe, equal, dividing equally, point of view, perspective, half, third, fourth, quarter, problem solving, simpler versions of a problem, persistence, subtracting 1, 2, 3, estimate, and multiples of 3.

rows.name::eng: Singing the Truth: The Story of Miriam Makeba
rows.author: Jade Mathieson
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has lots of shapes. Practice words: shape, rectangle, straight, circle, arc, oval, arch, cone, ellipse, different, same, flat, outline, and stripe.

rows.author: Vianne Venter
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has shapes and progressions. Practice words: muted, bright, rectangle, circle, arc, oval, ellipse, big, biggest, curve, vertical lines, parallel lines, stripe, twice, doubling, exponential growth, estimate, and counting by 2's and 4's.

rows.author: Joanne Bloch (retold folktale)
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has skip counting and shapes. Practice words: counting by 1's, 2's, 3's, 4's, and 6's; multiplying, dividing, estimate, rectangle, and triangle.

rows.author: Athieno Gertrude
rows.math_themes_words::eng: This story has counting, comparisons, and problem solving. Practice words: numbers to ten, skip counting, counting by 2's, 3's, 4's, 5's, and 10's, odd numbers, more, difference, add, combination, total, stripes, spots, big, biggest, fast, fastest, strong, strongest, large largest, high, higher, pattern, and problem solving.
